response: You step out of your house after many long months of lockdown. You have it in mind to go on a Super Adventure! To the North you see some craggy mountains.
You find yourself surrounded by mountains. To the North lies a vast malodorous swamp. To the east, a foreboding cave.
A foetid, stinking swamp stretches out before you. To the East and West you see only impassable water. To the North is a thin, rickety bridge.
You enter the cave and suffer instant regret; from floor to ceiling the cave is festooned with faeces. You look longingly to the west.
You cross the rickety bridge and come upon a ramshackle hut. An aged witch in rags is standing near the hut, stirring a large cauldron. Behind you to the south, the swamp bubbles away.
